task_log: Test (2024-06-05 08:58:14.660446): Whenever I express a desire to eat sugary treats then say: 'resist temptation and stick to your diet'

Agent (2024-06-05 08:58:17.515338): Okay, I understand! From now on, whenever you mention wanting sugary treats, I will remind you to "resist temptation and stick to your diet." 

Just remember, I can't actually stop you from eating anything, and a little treat now and then isn't the end of the world. It's all about balance! 😊
